Title: Button Mash: Arcade Bar
Description:
*Bring cash to exchange for game tokens*

Button Mash in Los Angeles is where nostalgia meets nightlife, delivering an unbeatable combination of retro fun, delicious eats, and good vibes. This eclectic arcade bar is a playground for gamers and food lovers alike, featuring a dazzling collection of vintage arcade games and pinball machines that’ll transport you straight back to the golden age of gaming. But it’s not just about the games—Button Mash serves up a mouthwatering menu of Asian-fusion comfort food, from crispy wings and savory bao to vegan delights and craft beer. The lively, neon-lit space pulses with energy, making it perfect for a night out with friends or a casual date. Whether you’re racking up high scores or just soaking in the nostalgic atmosphere, Button Mash is a vibrant haven where everyone can hit “start” on the fun.
Availability (Days & Hours):
Sun: 1PM-12AM
Mon: CLOSED
Tues: 5PM-12AM
Weds: 5PM-12AM
Thurs: 5PM-12AM
Fri: 5PM-2AM
Sat: 1PM-2AM
